title: (x) Please help with this one - Sansa Lloyds (customized Sansa Soft for Lloyd's of London) {Tamas}
content:
Does anyone know what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150228184639im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cert_font_sample_6405.jpg)
author: Monky Logic

comments.content:
Excellent. Nicely done. It is indeed. I found out it is called Sansa Lloyds. A custom font for Lloyd's of London.

[Brand Guidelines for the Coorporation of Lloyd's  
](http://web.archive.org/web/20150228184639/http:/www.lloyds.com/NR/rdonlyres/72DEA2D9-4EDC-4D8B-9946-85201D7937A5/0/Lloyds_Corporation_brand_guidelines06.pdf)

I can not find this font commercially (or otherwise) available. But since the numbers are all i need, Sansa Soft works perfectly.

Thanks so much Atwe.
